name.comment: external provider name: facebook, google, github...

content.comment: configuration data as string or JSON

uri.comment: media uri: relative path on local filesystem or remote URL

left_id.comment: left part of the relation object id

right_id.comment: right part of the relation object id

status.comment: object status: on, draft, off, deleted

uname.comment: unique and url friendly resource name (slug)

locked.comment: locked flag: some fields (status, uname,...) cannot be changed

published.comment: publication date, status set to ON

user_id.comment: link to users.id, if not null

person_title.comment: person title, for example Sir, Madame, Prof, Doct, ecc., can be NULL

gender.comment: gender, for example male, female, can be NULL

birthdate.comment: date of birth, can be NULL

deathdate.comment: date of death, can be NULL

company_name.comment: name of company, can be NULL

company_kind.comment: type of company, can be NULL

phone.comment: first phone number, can be NULL

side.comment: type position in relation, left or right

password_hash.comment: login password hash, if empty external auth is used
